snippet: BEIJING - China and the United States reached a deal Friday that calls for the dissident Chen Guangcheng to travel to the United States with his family, amid reports that activists close to Mr. Chen were being arrested or abused by authorities.  Read...
abstract: BEIJING - China and the United States reached a deal Friday that calls for the dissident Chen Guangcheng to travel to the United States with his family, amid reports that activists close to Mr. Chen were being arrested or abused by authorities. Read more »

headline.main: Nascent Deal Would Let Chen Guangcheng Study in U.S.
